question:
Consider the following statements about the Technology and Innovation Support Centre (TISC):
  1. It is an initiative by the Ministry of Science and Technology
  2. India's first Technology & Innovation Support Centre (TISC) has been set up in Gujarat
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is incorrect</u>. Technology and Innovation Support Centre (TISC) is an initiative of Department of Industrial Policy and Promotion (DIPP), Ministry of Commerce & Industry. <u>Second statement is incorrect</u>. Indiaâ€™s first Technology & Innovation Support Centre has been set up in Punjab. It has been set up by the World Intellectual Property Organization (WIPO) through Department of Industrial Policy & Promotion (DIPP).
